member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.GetNewSummaries(System.Nullable{System.Guid},System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns all new messages since the provided message ID. Returns only the summary without message content.
member.param: If not specified all recently received messages will be returned up to the page limit.
Mailbox name. If not specified, defaults to the mailboxName with name 'Default'
Max number of messages to retrieve. The most recent X are returned.

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.GetSummaries(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns a list of message summaries including basic details but not the content.
member.param: Case insensitive term to search for in subject,from,to
Mailbox name. If not specified, defaults to the mailboxName with name 'Default'
Property name from response type to sort by
True if sort should be descending
Page number to retrieve
Max number of items to retrieve

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.GetMessage(System.Guid)
member.summary: Returns the full message details for a message.
member.param: The message ID to get.

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.Reply(System.Guid,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Replies to the message with the specified ID using the configured relay SMTP server.
member.param: The Id of the message to reply to
List of email addresses separated by commas
List of email addresses separated by commas
List of email addresses separated by commas
Email address

True if the message should be delivered to the CC and BCC recipients in addition to the TO recipients. When false, the message is only delivered to the TO recipients, but the message headers will show the specified other recipients.
The subject of message
UTF8 encoded HTML body for the message

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.Send(System.String,System.String,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean,System.String)
member.summary: Sends a message via the configured upstream/relay SMTP server. The body of the request should be a HTML message to send encoded as UTF-8.
member.param: List of email addresses separated by commas
List of email addresses separated by commas
List of email addresses separated by commas
Email address

True if the message should be delivered to the CC and BCC recipients in addition to the TO recipients. When false, the message is only delivered to the TO recipients, but the message headers will show the specified other recipients.
The subject of message

Part ID

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.MessagesController.GetPartSource(System.Guid,System.String)
member.summary: Returns the source text of MIME part contents for the specified message and part.
member.param: Message ID
Part ID

members.member:
Returns the raw source of MIME part contents for the specified message and part.
RAW source is before any content decoding steps like base64. Message ID Part ID

Returns the raw source text of the specified message.
RAW source is before any content decoding steps like base64. Message ID

member.name: M:Rnwood.Smtp4dev.Controllers.ServerController.GetServer
member.summary: Gets the current state and settings for the smtp4dev server.

members.member:
Updates the state of and settings for the smtp4dev server.
Settings can not be updated if disabled in smtp4dev settings or if the settings file is not writable.
